titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to waive a maximum financed amount limitation with respect to vendee home loans made for homes located in economically distressed areas.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 2/3/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to waive the maximum financed amount limitation with respect to veterans' home loans made for homes located in economically distressed areas.
